Articles.Content:
I am having an issue, really not sure how to fix it or even what to search for on here for it.  Lately my space planes have been 'floating' on some invisible force on the runway. This force stops the plane from moving in any way. When I remove the cargo from the plane the problem goes away. Below is a list of installed addons and screenshots of the bug AND the cargo (incase its something bad in the cargo).

SCREENSHOTS

http://picpaste.com/screenshot0.png

http://picpaste.com/screenshot1.png

http://picpaste.com/screenshot2.png

 

MODS

KSP: 1.0.5 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit
USI Tools - 0.5.4
AutoAsparagus - 1.1
B9 Animation Modules - 1.0
B9 Aerospace - 5.4

2 hours ago, stali79 said:

Kerbal Konstructs - 0.9.5

Invisible collisions around the space center... I would check that one mod first. The author claims it's broken in 1.0.5, although there's been some interim work/patches that may fix it.

I ended up removing the cargo bit by bit, once I removed the LED headlight from Dr Jets Chop Shop it worked, funny thing is, there were 8 of them on there, once I removed 4 of them on the aft Rockomax Adapter thats when the bug disappeared. I am positive I could put them back on and not have the bug. but its just annoying when it happens and I would love to know why as I have had it in the past with other parts from other mods, not just the LED headlight.
